forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 7pm and 10pm, then a chance of freezing rain between 10pm and 11pm, then a chance of snow between 11pm and 1am, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. South southwest wind 1 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Buck's Run is in great shape. "A" skis. Firm surface that staying firm from the cold seeping from the ground. A little softness on top. A couple places where it's a little hard. Tracks are in really good shape and deep. Get out and skiing!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a comfortable day with the temperature to stay above freezing. The snow continues to be in good condition with excellent grooming. All of our terrain is open with the exception of the glades. The Pintail Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is tomato. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
